content: {A交给我}Me too, hoho~! I hope you can have a larger living space, so you can live even more comfortably and at ease.

content: When you were exchanging for the car, you probably noticed the <style=Highlight>Housing Services</style> in Loomi Mart.

content: What's wrong with small? It's comfortable here.

content: {A不好意思}I really appreciate it! Your sense of comfort is the best recognition for us. The meaning of home, after all, isn't in its size.

content: In the <style=Highlight>Loomi Footprints</style>, there might be some new and interesting life events, where you can easily gather <style=Highlight>3,000</style> Loomi to purchase a new house. {A抱歉}If you need anything, feel free to come find me.

content: For just <style=Highlight>3,000</style> Loomi, you can get a house, a proper house. Hoho~ It's bigger than your current place.

content: {A惊叹}Ah, is this what they call the power of insensitivity...? Hoho! But I still hope you can live more comfortably.
